Package tools.gui

Class ContentMovePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • tools.gui.ContentMovePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class ContentMovePanel
extends javax.swing.JLayeredPane
    Panel which zooms and scales the content inside the panel.

    WARNING
    This class is not yet tested, be carefull when using it.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • zoom

        public void zoom​(double amt)
        Zooms with the given amount.
        This value is multiplicative, i.e. zooming with z followed by 1/z will result in no zoom at all.
        The value must be positive. A value 0 < n < 1 signifies zooming out, while a value 1 < n signifies zomming in.
        Parameters:
        amt - The amount to zoom with.

      • zoomIn

        public void zoomIn()
        Zooms in with the default amount.
